item.title: APU Air Intake Door Actuation System – Door Open

remarks.para: May be inoperative secured open provided:

numlitem.para: APU is operated continuously during flight, and
Appropriate AOM performance adjustments are applied.
If APU air intake door is secured open, the APU must be operated continuously during flight, and the following performance corrections are applicable (Ref. B757 AAM).
Takeoff Weight Reduction - reduce Climb Limit Weight 500 lbs.
Landing Weight Reduction - reduce Climb Limit Weight 700 Ibs.
Method 1 or 2 Terrain Clearance Reduction – reduce 1500 lbs.
Takeoff Weight Reduction - 500 lbs to Climb Limit Weight.
Landing Weight Reduction - 700 lbs to Approach Climb Limit Weight.
Method 1 or 2 Terrain Clearance Reduction – 1500 lbs.
Add 370 lbs/hour MEL fuel usage for APU operation.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "INLET DOOR INOP OPEN" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
